title: Species Relationship Matrix
description: Documents the relationship between two species, including their overall dynamic, historical events, and mutual stereotypes. One entry per species pair. A hero to one species may be a villain to another.

id.description: Unique identifier for this relationship entry (auto-generated)

relationship_detail.description: Detailed description of the relationship dynamic

historical_events.description: Key historical events between these species

stereotypes_a_of_b.description: What species A generally believes about species B (may be wrong)

stereotypes_b_of_a.description: What species B generally believes about species A (may be wrong)

interbreeding_possible.description: Whether these species can produce offspring together

joint_settlements.description: Whether these species live together in joint settlements

trade_relationships.description: What trade exists between these species

x-cross-references.species-profile: Both species in the pair are defined in Species Profiles
x-cross-references.sovereign-power-profile: Territorial disputes may involve sovereign powers
x-cross-references.history-entry: Historical events between species may be formal history entries
